title: Transformers for the Cebuano Language
description: Scraped the internet for suitable Cebuano language corpora. Planning to fit a transformer model to create a language model.

title: Traffic Flow Counter
description: Implemented an app using the YOLO V3 algorithm to detect cars from traffic data.

title: CORD-19 Topic Modelling
description: Used the CORD-19 corpus to extract useful topics out of it. Used Non-negative Matrix Factorization.
